statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity >= 20 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 3 ORDER BY price ASC, product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY price ASC, product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE price >= 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM categories;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM products WHERE product_price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_quantity < 5 LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_quantity ASC
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM categories INNER JOIN products ON categories.category_id = products.product_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT product_name, product_price, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.product_id = categories.category_id ORDER BY product_price ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT warehouse_name FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, warehouse_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1 AND warehouse_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity, w.location FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE i.quantity > 5;

SELECT p.product_name, w.warehouse_name, i.quantity FROM products p, inventory i, warehouses w WHERE p.product_id = i.product_id AND i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id AND p.quantity < 20 ORDER BY p.product_name;
SELECT p.product_name, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.product_id = c.category_id
SELECT s.supplier_name, i.in_stock FROM suppliers s JOIN inventory i ON s.supplier_id = i.supplier_id WHERE i.in_stock = TRUE
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS num_products FROM products JOIN categories ON products.id = categories.id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_date, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) as total_products FROM categories JOIN products ON categories.id = products.id GROUP BY categories.id HAVING total_products > 5;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC;
